name: Citywide Technology
overview:
Citywide Technology (CWT Partners) is an HR outsourcing company, specializing in a technology staffing. We match skilled technical personnel, such as Application Developers, with tech companies that are building innovative products. We have been in business since 2002 and have a unique approach to our staffing services. Our clients have the opportunity to see their new employee at work and to know the match is right before committing to hire. We believe that the New York Tech scene is here to stay, and we know that our services can help it grow.

Our Business Model:

• We screen candidates based on your criteria

• You interview and choose an individual

• The person is added to your staff, but we cover their salary, insurance and payroll taxes

• You have first hand experience with the new hire and see how he or she fits into your
company

• You can finalize an employment decision
whenever you are ready, without restrictions

• We charge you an agreed upon rate, based on the hiring salary

• There is no up-front fee
